actionable_recommendations.issue: Lack of correction increases Type I error.
actionable_recommendations.recommendation: Use Bonferroni or FDR, or label as exploratory.
Report Shapiro-Wilk/KS test or use non-parametric tests.

actionable_recommendations.issue: Method of concealment (e.g. opaque envelopes) not described.
actionable_recommendations.recommendation: Specify how randomization sequence was concealed.
Distinguish between pre-specified endpoints and exploratory analyses.
actionable_recommendations.source_text: Found term 'multiple comparisons' without rigorous correction.
